participant_1.background:
I remember pretending to be a dragon trainer with my siblings at the park and getting lost in our imagination.
I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice.
my hobby creating houses out of matches.
I've seen a blue whale while on a boat tour in Alaska.
my favorite food is shrimp.

participant_2.background:
I was forced to flee my home country and start a new life in a foreign land.
I am an adult male who enjoys eating meat and spending time with my family and friends.
i am starting an internship at a construction site next week.
i have a black lab.
I am often in pain so I read to distract myself.

content.text: Hi there! I'm new here. My name is participant_1.
Nice to meet you! What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy taking yoga classes, building houses out of matches, and pretending to be a dragon trainer.
That's really interesting! I've never tried yoga before, but I've always been curious about it. And I've never heard of building houses out of matches, but it sounds like a fun challenge.
It is! It's a good way to pass the time and let your imagination run wild.
I bet! I'm always looking for new ways to entertain myself.
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I enjoy spending time with my family and friends, eating meat, and reading to distract myself from pain.
That sounds like a nice way to relax.
It is! I'm glad I have such a supportive family and friends.
Me too! I'm lucky to have them in my life.
What are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
That's okay! You have plenty of time to figure it out.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear that.
It was nice talking to you! I hope we can talk again sometime.
Me too! It was nice meeting you.
